name: uncomely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not attractive in appearance: She was seventeen, and not uncomely. The exterior masonry now looks defaced with its uncomely masses of rough brick. Compare
comely
More examplesFewer examplesWe plonked our uncomely, middle-aged bodies in the big wicker chairs.The tufts of grass are unsociably wide apart, with uncomely spots of barren sand between.Her square flat figure and uncomely coarse face kept recurring distinctly in my mind's eye.
